<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Car parking reservation">f64205c54709711021f49128436d433a</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:e7ffa2de4785f11021f49128436d43bd</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>check all</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   var all = g_form.getValue('u_all_in');
	alert(all);
	if(all == "true"){
		alert(all);
		g_form.setValue('u_price',"150 บาท");
	}else{
		g_form.clearValue('u_price');
	}
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-05 17:17:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>261e57524789f11021f49128436d43e8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>check all</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Car parking reservation" source="x_950909_car_park">083c1ad84741311021f49128436d4349</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Car parking reservation">083c1ad84741311021f49128436d4349</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_261e57524789f11021f49128436d43e8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-05 17:20:42</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
